text: Michaël Wiggers (born 8 February 1980) is a Belgian football player currently playing for RRC Stockay-Warfusée. He previously played for a number of clubs in Belgium. ==References== ==External links== * Guardian Football * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Standard Liège players Category:S.V. title: Michaël Wiggers
